website_summaries.verdict: The installation may bog down a bit, but this powerful, smooth-running winch won't.
pros: Available in a variety of capacities, from 2,500 pound to 4,500 pound
Works well in water, mud, and at all temperatures
Great look, and runs smooth and quiet
cons: Some aspects of the installation, such as wiring, and size of the winch, can be a bit of a chore
Some buyers report quality problems with the cable and solenoid

website_summaries.verdict: Sealed solenoid and circuit-breaker protection ensure safe and reliable use in all weather conditions.
pros: Highly efficient with a low amp draw, making it easier on your battery
Roller fairlead included with a very heavy-duty hook
Pulling 3,500 pounds makes it a great higher-load option
cons: Comes with synthetic rope instead of cable, which can sometimes get twisted on the drum

customer_reviews.title: Product was used not new, I paid for a new one!
customer_reviews.text: Total BS. The product was obviously used the rope was black w oh th dirt rather than yellow and already had tears in it. Not cool at all
customer_reviews.author: Bjleau

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need to install on a SXS. ...
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to install on a SXS. I had to swap the cables around so I could use the longer ones to reach my battery on my pioneer 700. Havent had to use it yet, but sure it'll do the job. Lifetime warranty without the need to save proof of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JStiver

customer_reviews.title: Terra 35, 3500lbs winch
customer_reviews.text: It's a PITA! I had to cut down the provided 'mount' to fit around weld joints on an AC-400. Yes, connection info is clear - where to put all the parts is not. There is a limited 'dry space' on a Quad (Arctic Cat 400) so I'm still trying to sort out "where" to put the power relay, and 'splicing' the power for that relay is problematic under the triple tree. Still working on that part, for now jumper cables for winch power - but that won't be an option for a snow plow. Everything else - after the mount mod - was easy by lifting the 'body' of the Quad 4 inches to run cables neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Mudrat54

customer_reviews.title: Poor rope quality
customer_reviews.text: The rope on my terra35 broke within 5 minutes of its first use. It was installed exactly as instructed on the Superwinch website. Called the company and was told they have no warranty or replacement services for any ropes or cables they sell. Leads me to believe they use inferior equipment if they choose not the stand behind their product. I have contacted superwinch in hopes to get this resolved but i fear i will just have to spend another 100 bucks on a replacement rope and steer clear of superwinch from here out
customer_reviews.author: Craig R

customer_reviews.title: First Superwinch - TOP RATED ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Top notch product that I had installed on a 2016 Polaris 900 RZR Trail. It was easy to install, works well and was incredible powerful when I needed it. It"s amazing how stuck you can get a RZR and this winch had it out and me on the way in no time at all. I would recommend this winch to anyone that is looking for a powerful and top notch product at a reasonable price. If you buy any other winch, you are flat throwing your money away. Superwinch has earned a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Austin

customer_reviews.title: High quality winch kit.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on a 2017 Polaris Sportsman 850. I used the Superwinch 2202900 mount kit. This is probably the largest winch you could fit easily in to that ATV. I had to trim about a 1/2 inch of the lower front end ATV plastic to get the yellow free spool cap on the winch to turn freely. The wiring was a challenge. 10lbs of sh*t in a 5lb bag. I ran the wires three times before I was satisfied with its routing. All in all it seems to be a high quality winch kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2020 ranger 1000
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the winch it seems to be of good quality. Comes with everything needed to to install I happened to install on a 2020 ranger 1000 eps. The only thing lacking is the instructions. I gave up on the instructions and used my best judgment for I have some knowledge of winch installations. This winch coupled with the kfi winch plate is awesome, however you can only use the part of the winch plate that attaches to the vehicle because the fairlead plate won’t allow you to attach the fairlead.
customer_reviews.author: tom cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, good value. Kubota RTV 900
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is my first SuperWinch after owing a Warn for 10years. This one is MUCH quieter than the Warn which is what I have read. I installed this on my Kubota RTV900. I used a Warn mounting plate kit and I only had to enlarge the 3/4 inch hole to 1" for the remote cable. The Warn adapter kits comes with the mounting for the winch as well as a bracket for the in/out button and remote cable. It also comes with a plate to mount the relay and circuit breaker. I had to drill an extra hold for the breaker but it worked out very well. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: WHammer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy installation instructions were adequate
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on my Polaris with additional winch plate. Fairly easy installation instructions were adequate. If you get the synthetic rope it has to be installed. Make sure you loosen the Allen bolt in the roller or the rope will not go thru the hole. Instructions doesn’t mention anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Customer service. Is terrible. Product failed on first use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this winch for my trailer did wiring and installed 300 lawn tractor battery. Battery charges off the towing vehicle. I am a mechanic and did a test run in and out a foot. First time I used winch. I smiled and pulled it out by hand. Was pulling in and had to reverse a foot. Moved mower over and hit switch. Nothing solenoid chucked nothing installed multimeter on motor 13.1 volts in and out. Reverses like a window motor. I've mad 9 calls and sent an email still haven't talked to a technical advisor. I won't buy a super wench again
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit Honda Pioneer 1000-5
customer_reviews.text: This winch is about 1/4" too tall to fit a Honda Pioneer 1000-5 with Warn mount. It will rub on the inside of the skid plate on the bottom of the bumper. Also the Warn mount (maybe all mounts) for the Pioneer 1000-5 requires the winch to be mounted upside down (hung from the winch mount) and Superwinch indicates this will void your warranty. In addition, a winch this size should come with a dash mounted switch instead of the handlebar mounted switch. It is unlikely a 4500 lb winch will be used on an ATV.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 18 RZR XP 4 1000
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Superwinch Terra purchase and I’ve always been happy. I was a little hesitant this time around because some websites state that a wide spool winch won’t fit properly on a RZR XP 4 1000. I used a KPI winch mount along with the additional wide fairlead bracket. Everything went together very easily with zero issues. I wish Superwinch would include a dash switch vs a handlebar switch. I almost tried a 4500 Kolpin winch that looks almost identical to the Polaris branded winches but much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Grinstead

customer_reviews.title: I think it's going to be a great winch. It was a real pain in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's going to be a great winch. It was a real pain in the ass to mount though considering I got the wrong winch mount had to do a lot of altering to make it work. I might make a suggestion, when mounting this winch on a 2015 polaris rzr 900 trail 50" where the battery is not anywhere near the winch motor. Some of the wires that came with the winch were way to short & some were way to long. I was barely able to make it work by altering the colors codes. It all worked out in the end. I love the end product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 16 Rubicon terra 35
customer_reviews.text: This was for a 16 Honda rubicon , I bought the KFI winch mount for it. The mount included won't work. Ok the winch will only install upside down. Per customer service at Superwinch , it won't affect operation of the winch or void the warranty. Mine works fine it's just upside down. The wiring included is about 18" longer than I need. I'll need to cut and replace the connectors for a cleaner looking install. Overall I'm happy with it , just think superwinch needs to include more info on installation , like upside down mount possibility on some models.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beast. It has never let me down. I now have a plow on my ATV and this winch works flawless to operate it. I have also been burried in mud and snow and this thing pulls me right out no problem. I have a 2012 Brute Force 750 and I have about 400lbs on it for weight so I can get better traction for plowing. Took it up in the field and sunk into a snow drift about 4 feet deep. Winch pulled me right out. ATV weighs about 700lbs just by itself. With me on it it's about 1400lbs that had to be pulled out of that snow drift and it did it with my plow down!!
customer_reviews.author: Blue eyed devil

customer_reviews.title: Still cheap Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Got the terra 45 model in and tried to mount on my pioneer 1000 Honda.Tried to clock the motor as advertised and the brushes popped out .SuperWinch customer service says it's incredibly hard but it can be put back together.Ive been in the electrical field 25 years and it's not going back together the way he said.Tried to separate the motor from the gearbox and the Chinese bolts are so soft they stripped out.I should have spent a little more on a Warn.Its pretty much a disposable winch if you have trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winch. Easy to install with the right mounting bracket. Do your homework. I bought the wrong bracket first time around. Wiring was pretty straight forward but took me awhile to do a really good install with remote. Keep solenoid up high in the frame out of potential water. Had lots of extra length of wire to deal with if you want to keep factory terminations but there is enough there to mount switches, remote and solenoid anywhere on your machine. I didn’t come with a rubber bumper for the lead and thimble to test against the fairlead when retracted.
customer_reviews.author: robert tatum

customer_reviews.title: Best winch on the market, period. Quality + great price = value
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a winch, and what a price! For the money, you CANNOT beat this winch. Move over Warn, Superwinch is gunning for your market share and doing a great job of it. Quality product for a great price = value that you can't beat. I love this winch and it's proven itself time and time again. It was easy to install, takes a beating and keeps on ticking. Very high quality product for my 2015 Honda Rancher FA5 (I used the KFI mount specifically for this model ATV and it worked perfect, though snug/tight).
customer_reviews.author: BTR

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Terra 35 10 months ago... hooked it up and everything worked great. the ATV sat over the winter, i got it out and used the winch two days ago and nothing. the solenoid just clicks, no actuation. So i reached out to Superwinch directly about warranty replacement or fix and they will not answer their phones nor reply to my multiple email requests to their customer service email address. A winch is a tool i require and i am now forced to go buy a new winch (from another manufacturer)... terrible customer support, bad product. Dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mounted this winch on my can am commander worked great for 4 months then stoped working so amazon replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this winch on my can am commander worked great for 4 months then stoped working so amazon replaced it and i put the second one on and now 1 year 4 months later it stoped working again just makes clicking noise. I have the sylonoid mounted up and out of any water so idk why this thing keeps goin bad. Would not recomend this to no one
customer_reviews.author: Wvhoundsman

customer_reviews.title: this one was one of the worst. Power is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this winch. Have owned both expensive and cheaper models of winches, this one was one of the worst. Power is lacking, the 1500 this replaced had more lifting power. After about six months of use, the brushes are worn and needs to be torn apart. The only small plus to this winch is its speed, quicker than most.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Great winch, hardware isn’t great though.
customer_reviews.text: Love the winch. Love the look. I feel like for the price though the bolts should be grade 8 and the two bolts that are used to mount the hawse are not long enough. The winch comes with a mounting bracket but let’s be honest. Everybody buys a mounting bracket specifically for their machine. So that’s kind of pointless. The bolts would work for that mounting bracket only. Other than that the winch is good. Had one on another 4wheeler and have a big one on my truck. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Nassar

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Just installed but not tried yet. Hope I dont need but will one day. Everything looks like a good quality winch and mounted and wired up easy. I found on my 2019 Polaris XP 900 that I swapped the winch to relay cables for the battery to relay cables. Thats because I installed the relay under the hood and not by the battery as the instructions suggest. Worked better that way for me. Installed the circuit breakers by the battery. DH
customer_reviews.author: D.H. from Florida. Awesome book!!  Will not be disappointed reading this book.

customer_reviews.title: Still new
customer_reviews.text: Still new but i have a 3,000 pound Super winch that works great. When I got the 3,000 pounder it had a small problem and the manufacture's fixed it so fast it made my head spin. Great people to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: JMG Leduc

customer_reviews.title: A dream
customer_reviews.text: Once I finally got the correct winch mount kit, things went very well. Do your homework (difficult) and research to see which mounting kit your wheeler will need at the same time you order the winch kit. Installation is straight forward and the rope line is worth every penny over a cable because it is so much safer. Ropes drop when they break, where cables whip back and can really hurt you. Also cables fray and poke through just about any glove which ruins gloves and puts holes in hands....not good when you are off on a remote trip through bogs etc. I absolutely love both of my superwinches, which are installed on my atvs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is one powerful winch
customer_reviews.text: I ride my Honda 420 ATV a lot in ATV parks. If you need to get out of the mud or up a extremely steep angle this winch will do the job. I've used it to pull others out of the mud as well. This winch pulled my ATV strait up a tree. Can't be beat for the price I paid. I had a ATV shop install mine. I ask them if it was hard and they said is was easy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Huebel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Winch
customer_reviews.text: Already used the Superwinch to rescue the driver of a mid-sized pickup truck who thought he could tackle deep sand on an off-road trail. The installation took me the good part of a weekend however I couldn't be happier with the result. While not Superwinch's fault, the hardest part of my install was an aftermarket adapter plate made by another manufacturer that didn't fit too well. Saved a lot on labor cost by doing this myself. However, the installation on my Polaris RZR4 900 did require longer battery cables than what came in the kit which I purchased locally. Recommend also adding a bumper for the hook as one does not come in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Nice winch
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a few missing parts since I bought this open box. Would be 5 stars if (1) the thumb switch power wire was as long as the forward and reverse leads and (2) the 2x50a breakers didnt need an extremely large box, which i had to replace with an inline for a clean install. Wires were plenty long and i used the cutoffs to replace my missing ones. I also added a wireless remote. Very quiet and moves quick.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Pulled me out of a 3ft deep mud hole and has been standing up to normal water and mud abuse. Install instructions were good just get a new switch for side x side install
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have it set up for temporary operation from my pickups trailer receiver. Maybe a bit light, but then again I have a small truck and I just use it to yard out sections of logs 10" x 20' when cutting firewood. Strikes me as a solid well built unit.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: kawasaki teryx
customer_reviews.text: mounted on Kawasaki teryx using aftermarket winch mount by kfi. Like the option to use remote or direct switch. I upgraded the wiring and added a better sylenoid between winch and battery. very impressed, had it on for 2 seasons with medium use. 3yrs later... still going strong, use it to run my snow plow in winter. use it to pull logs for firewood, great winch
customer_reviews.author: my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! I did buy a KFI Snatch Block just ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent many hours researching winches, trying to determine if this unit would pull my 2000# boat lift out of the water. (Rolling weight, skid, incline, sandy bottom, etc). My lift has no wheels, but sits on 8x12 skids. I secured this winch to a tree and it pulled the lift out in less than 10 minutes, using approximately 35 feet of cable. My wife worked the control, while I "steered" the lift. Beats using my neighbors Jeep for the last 5 years! Very happy! I did buy a KFI Snatch Block just in case, and never used it. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: grillkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I did all the research like most people. This was the best rated. We go off-road with atv almost every weekend. First time, things came loose so figured I'd take the blame for that. 2nd time out, the whole thing stopped working all together. Relay seems to still be good, everything is hooked up right. My only guess at this point is the motor burned up. DO NOT BUY. Friends have harbor freight winches that work just the same if not better for half the price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Superwinch Terra 35. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Superwinch Terra 35 from Amazon and had it installed on my RZR 800 within a couple of hours of receiving it. Came with everything you need for a clean install and more than enough wiring. Just be sure to order the model specific mounting plate for your atv or side by side as this will simplify installation. I went with the KFI mount. Overall the winch is a great value. It is well made and operates extremely quiet. Very happy with this purchase and couldn't beat the price! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Winch-Good - Rope-Bad
customer_reviews.text: Great Winch! But the rope is not real synthetic rope its cheap nylon like rope! this cost $40 more then the steel rope one. Buy that and go to the hardware you will same $30. All other parts are good. and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Had a little installation issue. The motor terminals interfered with the bumper on my Artic Cat. I sent an email to customer service and the tech answered within a couple of hours with instructions. Made the change and installed without a problem. Seems to be well built. Great response from customer service.
customer_reviews.author: HSS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for my mom's Arctic cat 500 trv and one for my dad's wildcat cat trail. I installed both. They have been in use about a year now, both have worked great. My atv has a warn winch, but if that winch broke I would replace with super winch Terra. The installation went fairly well considering the tight confines of the ATVs. The winch and all it's parts seem very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on my 2007 honda rubicon. I didn't have a lot of choices for mounting the solenoid or circuit breaker on my atv that was by far the hardest part. I took my time and hid all the wires, I like a clean stock look when I can help it. The winch itself was easy to install, I used a superwinch mounting bracket it worked good, I liked it better than kfi bracket. I didn't like the u bolts on the kfi bracket. The wiring diagram was very helpful. I had no issues with the in and out directions of the winch. I will update my review after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bewildered.

customer_reviews.title: Great winch! Have already used it on a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Great winch! Have already used it on a couple different occasions and is well worth the money. Seems very reliable and heavy duty made. Only recommendation would be to go ahead and spend the incremental difference and get the synthetic line. Being my first winch, I now see what people are talking about on the 'memory' in the cable as there are noticeable twists down the line. Still functions but imagine it has effect on the strength over time. I will probably switch out to synthetic soon. Otherwise, awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice winch for the money. Since it wasn’t going on a high dollar rig I didn’t want to spring for a warn but I have been very pleased with this winch. I’ve used it several times with no issue. I would buy superwinch brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tool enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one package.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in a good quality winch minus the mounting bracket. I purchased the bracket to match with my 2018 Kawasaki Teryx 4. It was easy to install with plenty of cable for the power and the remote. I've only used it a few times but well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bibby

customer_reviews.title: I like to try things out before I post a review
customer_reviews.text: I like to try things out before I post a review. We placed this wench on our "working" four wheeler. We have hauled bags of garbage, tree limbs and large tractor tires (100lbs easy) from a 30 foot drop with this wench. It never stopped for even a second. Although small, its power is quite impressive. This wench gets an A PLUS. Most of the objects we have winched have been heavier than a four wheeler + passenger, so be prepared to secure small vehicles to something sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof2

customer_reviews.title: Great winch from an amazing company
customer_reviews.text: Only had the winch for a few months before selling my SXS. However, I used it to pull a 2000lb Can Am off rocks and then again to recover my wife’s Ford Escape that was stuck in the snow. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: demlockian

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've use this winch at least a dozen times and has worked as it should. I have it on a honda pioneer 500. The only thing I don't like is there is no spare room for the cable. It needs to wind up perfectly or it will grind and fray on the cross supports of the winch. I'm going to shorten the cable to stop this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Burmeister

customer_reviews.title: The winch itself is probably a good winch. The issue I have had is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The winch itself is probably a good winch. The issue I have had is the solenoid provided with the winch. It burned up, blowing fuses for months until I figured out what was intermittently shorting out. I ordered a replacement solenoid which didn't work in both directions. I've owned the winch 2 years now and have only been able to use it a couple of times due to the solenoid being the weak link. Would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 10ToedKiller

customer_reviews.title: Install was pretty straight forward with the KFI winch mount
customer_reviews.text: I have had this winch on my 2009 Renegade for six weeks now. Install was pretty straight forward with the KFI winch mount. Today with the second snow clearing I dd with it and the Terra Solenoid crapped out. The contacts are sticking opened for spooling out. I have reached out to Superwinch and will see how well there customer support is. I will update my review depending on their response. I was pretty happy with it until today.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Evans

customer_reviews.title: Tried all the troubleshooting recommended and still does not work
customer_reviews.text: This winch did not operate correctly right out of the box. Tried all the troubleshooting recommended and still does not work. Cost more to end back than to get a new different one. Spend the money for a Warn
customer_reviews.author: Trappercreek

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a superwinch. So I decided to try it out mainly for the price and the advertising it's done on popular off road shows. Mounted on a honda pioneer 700-4 and couldn't be more pleased. I like that it comes with all items needed to wire it up unlike some other winch brands. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Check the winch mounting bolts for proper length.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2005 Polaris 700 ATV. This winch replaced a worn out polaris winch. Direct fit, no install problems. The only concern I had and which I fixed was the 4 mounting bolts needed to be about a third of a inch longer to have the needed thread grip(at least on my atv mount). This winch is rated at about a thousand pounds more line pull then the winch it replaced. Works great, the added power is very welcome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the winch is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because they only send you about 12-15 inches of positive and negative leads. You would think when buying their top of the line winch you would get decent length cables. Other than that the winch is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: With proper adapter kit and a bit of install time the winch works great ! The only problem or issue I can say with this item is , after releasing a few feet or so of cable I found pinched/fraid cable. aprox 30 inches in after the hook install loop. It needs to be shortened and new end installed. Other than that it's as advertised and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: james s.

customer_reviews.title: Best Winch for the $$$$$$
customer_reviews.text: I waited to hive a review, been on my Polaris for 3 months. Works and works well. Installation was a little challenging but once I learned how to read it bolted right up. Wiring was easy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Installed 5 days ago on my 2009 Yamaha Grizzly 700. Install was simple as the wires are color cordinated and instructions are well written. I also installed a Tractor Supply brand (Traveler) wireless remote , which created a challenge of its own. The wires are nice and long, I had to cut to length and crimp new 6 gauge electrical connectors . The synthetic rope is the way to go . Light, Strong and easy to work with. There is a mounting plate included but you should purchase an ATV specific mounting plate separate!!!!!! Winch has worked flawlessly so far and I plan to continue making it work just as hard as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Winch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good instructions. I bought a different winch mount for my 2015 Kawasaki Teryx 2 seater but it didn't work so i used the supplied winch mount and had to drill a few holes in the Teryx mounting plate and buy some longer bolts to mount the winch but it turned out really good. It comes with plenty of wire and the winch remote was fairly easy to install. I purchased to use at Wind Rock off road park but we didn't get into anything to harry to use it but i was glad i had it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Shuff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install yourself, just watch some YouTube videos before hand on your particular vehicle. The hardest part is locating a place for the solenoid
customer_reviews.author: David Tilley

customer_reviews.title: This wench works great!! We put it to the test
customer_reviews.text: This wench works great!! We put it to the test. I work in the construction industry. We have pulled over 50 geothermal units up a flight of stairs on a rail system we fabricated. Some of the units weighed 1,500 lbs. This saved us a ton of labor expense on the project.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a polaris and been a happy campah
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved me from many stranded scenarios in the deep woods of maine. I would recommend it to others and i think it's a must have for all atv, utv, and trucks. Never know when you may run into a situation where your winch will become your best friend and if you didn't have one..... you'll be a sorry one stranded out in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Check your product before putting it online
customer_reviews.text: This is not a new product. Looks like someone tried to pry yellow cover off end with screwdriver or something. Bolts were strewn throughout the box; bag was ripped open and tried to seal with scotch tape. Should not have been listed as new.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: This bad boy mounted right to my existing hole pattern on ...
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy mounted right to my existing hole pattern on mt Arctic Cat ATV. A simple install, all new everything, a good dynamic brake and plenty of power. I've recently used it to yard some very large sections of downed trees to get them closer to the log splitter location (before cutting into rounds) I have to chain the back of the frame to another tree or this thing will pull my ATV toward the log if it's too heavy. Plenty of power for whatever you are doing on an ATV.
customer_reviews.author: mkatchew

customer_reviews.title: I believe Superwinch is the best bang for the buck in the winch world at ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe Superwinch is the best bang for the buck in the winch world at this time. I read the complaints. All hardware and screws are quite adequate. The issue with the circuit breaker not being isolated can be solved (if you care to) with a plastic isolation box that you can buy at Home Depot for $1, that's what I did. The synthetic rope is made by Amsteel-Blue which is considered the best. The in/out switch seems heavy duty and the remote wired controller is fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is the secont Terra 35 winch that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the secont Terra 35 winch that I have bought through Amazon - the first being installed on my Honda Pioneer 700 - I was going to purchase the Terra 25 but this was about $20 more, so I got it - I purchased a Superwinch mount since the KFI mount will not work with Terra winches - installing took some time since I was careful and trimmed wiring as I went - it made for a clean look
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bisbee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described and came quickly. As with any added on electric device to a vehicle it takes some time to make sure you got the wiring right but if you take your time it’s doable
customer_reviews.author: M. northup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Had an issue, was solved within minutes. New part shipped ASAP!!!!! Don't buy a warn!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: ... research and the winch itself seems to be of good quality, but not the fuse and solenoid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after lots of research and the winch itself seems to be of good quality, but not the fuse and solenoid. I waited till today (bought it on August 20, 2014) to install and found out that the solenoid that comes with it is broke. I can't mount it because the bracket is stripped out. Now I can't return it and can't use the winch. Not the best quality solenoid I have installed or seen, but everything else looks fine. Hopefully I can find a replacement one since I am out of the exchange window. Going to call Superwinch and see how customer service is and will update this review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: beemorris

customer_reviews.title: Nice winch.
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest winch I can manage to mount on my quad. I haven't used it yet but I'm impressed with the apparent quality and don't expect to have problems. I had a weaker winch that didn't work well for me due to a lack of power and that's a problem when you need something to work. I don't expect to have problems with this winches power.
customer_reviews.author: Robin97396

customer_reviews.title: Good strong winch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good strong winch. I've been using it for several years on a RZR900. Have pulled numerous vehicle out of trouble (including once for myself). Rope has held up well and motor has good power for what it's designed for (ATVs and UTVs). Never use on a full size vehicle! I took away one star because I had to repair the drum. The weld on the side of the drum split causing the drum to drag and hang up the winch. Not hard to repair, but it was caused by a poor manufacturing process. Like most winches of this size it's pretty slow. All in all, a good winch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Quiz1

customer_reviews.title: Needs better mount for solenoid (bigger bracket) All in all it ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on my 2015 Can-Am Outlander Max 1000. Took along time to Install. Mainly trying to figure out where to mount the solenoid. I bought this because Can-Am uses it on some of their models. I thought it would be a quick connect right to the wiring, which it was not. So running wires too a lot of time. Needs better mount for solenoid (bigger bracket) All in all it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Love Superwinch
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. The first one was on my RZR. Used it for several years mainly with the snow plow, but also for general pulling. Never had an issue with it. This one went on my Viking VI. Also pulls great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome winch and happy with performance. Can be difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance with winch. It could be very difficult to install if you havent done one before. I had to make some modifications to install.For instance: there was no hardware to mount spare switch to Bike. I actully made one out of scrap metal. I had to drill holes in the frame of the bike to mount the contactor box. I would have given 5 stars but difficulty installing made me say it was less than perfect. Once installed, I am pleased with performance and dependability. It also looks great. It arrived on time and cost way less than buying the same exact winch in the same exact box at Bass Pro.
customer_reviews.author: cody allen

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Runs quiet. switches feel good quality. Has handlebar switch but I wanted to mount under dash. Drilled out bolt holes put longer machine nut an bolts works great and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Bruce VBerg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding winch
customer_reviews.text: Installed pretty easily. Got a little confused because in my application it requires the line pull to be over the drum. I used it about 7 times the first day it was installed pulling people up the hill in front of my house. Plenty of power, almost an un-needed amount of power for a 4 wheeler. Why not though?
customer_reviews.author: mr.fix.it

customer_reviews.title: The wiring on this winch is easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I had a chance to use this winch with my snowplow. This thing is a beast! I added it to an older 4-wheeler, kind of a pain to find a mounting bracket for my model. The wiring on this winch is easy to hook up! I ended up mounting the relay and fuse stuff, under the seat, keeps it dry. The power is there when you need it. I pulled the 4-wheeler out of a huge snowbank with ease, that is where the remote comes in handy! Overall, very happy with this setup!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This winch is of good quality. I bolted it to my 2014 rancher 420 using the kfi mount. It was a tight fit because this winch is huge for a 2500 lb winch. This winch is powerful I used it to free my atv from a mud hole that I was high centered in and tried to pull up some bushes in the yard with it and it pulled the atv with front and back brakes firmly applied. I am impressed with the quality of this product from the couple of times I have used to.
customer_reviews.author: David 1028

customer_reviews.title: Great winch, solenoid is a little awkward
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made winch kit for a good price. The hardware is good and the wiring equipment quite adequate. The power leads are #6 cable with copper ends. The installation on a 2009 Yamaha Grizzly is a bit of a pain, as I had to custom-make a bracket to make the solenoid fit inside the battery cover. I also had to cut the extremely long power leads, but that wasn't the end of the world either, you just have to know how to solder on some new ends. I'm pretty happy with this purchase and it's what I wanted. Time will tell if the winch lasts as long as I hope it does!
customer_reviews.author: astuteshopper

customer_reviews.title: Fit Polaris ranger 800 midsize
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Fits my Polaris ranger 800 midsize. I used the KFI winch mount kit - Polaris ranger 500/800. Everything fit perfectly. Winch looks to be heavy duty and built well. Price is excellent for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler Broadaway

customer_reviews.title: died
customer_reviews.text: was good and strong as rated, but after 4 years with very minimal use, and kept indoors it failed to work, of course at a critical time......expected more from an expensive winch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: powerful very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to a Maverick Turbo XDS X3, after lawn darting on a treacherous down hill, this winch completely lifted my X3 with so much a strain. At 9pm in the dark and waining flash lights---I was very and am very pleased. excellent buy for the quality and power. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dupre1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Winch installed easily and appears to be of good quality. I was disappointed that it arrived three days (5 days after ordered) late with no explanation. I should have opted for the 5 day shipping and received the $5 credit.
customer_reviews.author: GLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ranger 500 Crew.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2013 Polaris Ranger 500 Crew. Fits perfectly with KFI winch mount. Wires are exactly the right length to reach back to the battery, install was pretty simple (download the link to the etrailer.com website and they give you an excellent step by step installation video). I haven't used the winch but it seems very smooth, can't wait to try it out. Everything you need is in the box except for the mounting bracket (there is one in the box but it won't work on the Ranger).
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace older winch it was available. The cable that my buddy snapped on old winch was out of stock during Deer Season
customer_reviews.author: LMF1

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough installation
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I had was finding a spot for the solenoid and the breaker. Other than that, installation went without a hitch and operated first time power was connected. This is my second Superwinch winch and so far I have no complaints. I have one observation though. The yellow operating switch on this TERRA model seems flimsy compared to my Superwinch 2500 atv winch that I have on my Honda Rancher 420. Don't know how this yellow switch will hold up. Only time will tell. I would have preferred the old black switch, when just seems beefier.
customer_reviews.author: P. Guillotte

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 2018 polaris 450 ho with the 2202900 superwinch mounting bracket, perfect fit all around. Very heavy duty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific NW

customer_reviews.title: Warranty no good
customer_reviews.text: Winch lasted less than a year. Company sold out to Westin and they refused to stand behind lifetime warranty. I bought 4 of these winches and all 4 are tore up..
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This thing will pull
customer_reviews.text: Moved a 16" diameter white pine out of my camp trail without any issues. Used a nylon strap to connect to the tree to avoid kinking the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Raps

customer_reviews.title: Good installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only for my snow plow. Good installation instructions. It would not fit inside the mount I bought for my 2016 Polaris Sportsman 570 EPS but that's not the fault of Superwinch (see separate review for the Extreme Max 5600.3160ATV mount). Amazon raised the price on this winch by $40 a few days after I purchased it so I'm happy with the deal I got.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for 2014 Polaris Sportsman 850xp not knowing if it fit the factory winch mount box, but upon fitment it couldn't have been any better. It came with all the things needed and then some. It came with all solenoids, switched, cables and wiring. The only thing I needed was my tools which was mostly for tearing the quad apart. Its a great winch that was far cheaper than factory winches and more powerful. Very sturdy and seems like it will hold up for a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Koleman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great winch for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winch for the money. There are some negative reviews when it comes to the Superwinch brand, but I have not had an issue yet. This one pulled out a 2009 Teryx and a Polaris Ranger from some sloppy mud at the same time. I highly recommend this one. Install on the Teryx was not easy, but that is no fault of the winch.
customer_reviews.author: Sven A. Helms

customer_reviews.title: Rope Broke
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with my purchase until the cable broke the third time I used it. I bought this to raise and lower a plow on my Polaris ranger (and had the entire set up professionally installed). All was great until the third use when the cable broke while raising the plow. I emailed the manufacturer and have yet to receive a response.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Abilo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for a top of the line winch.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic winch, and a great price. Coming from a very expensive warn on my Honda foreman, this winch is 2x the winch that warn was. The kit was complete and included high quality components and cabling. I am very pleased with the kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: works properly
customer_reviews.text: works properly, however it does not fit the 2019 Polaris RZR 570 as it states.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've owned two warn and they went in garbage can with in a year
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these, one on my polaris rzr 1000 and one on my rhino. Mud riding , you'll use your winch. I'm impressed with the product as many people were too when the watched it pulled my rzr thru mud up to the head lights. No one could believe it was that strong. I suggest it over a warn, I've owned two warn and they went in garbage can with in a year.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Winch!
customer_reviews.text: Great winch, I am an avid off roader and have had problems with the last three Warn winches I have had. After a ton of research I decided to go with this winch. First time out I used it to pull my buddies Polaris General 4 on 30's out of the goo and it pulled like a mule. I used it a few more times to pull some rides over to work on them and could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Superwinch Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of winches for our new RZR and chose the Superwinch based on great reviews and feedback from those who have them. A winch is an item you hope you'll never need, but I have no doubt my Superwinch will perform well if I do need it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, installed on a under hood warn mount for 2016 wildcat 1000. the Haws fairlead is to big, as in to wide, to use as I needed so I just use a roller and it works fine even with synthetic cable.
customer_reviews.author: Beuford T Justice

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Works fine. Came with all bolts, wires, ect. Glad to have a quality product. Works great and didn't have to buy anything extra.
customer_reviews.author: Dg3toyota

customer_reviews.title: The instructions included for this item were great. Two people who never installed a winch were ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions included for this item were great. Two people who never installed a winch were able to install this item on our UTV. Granted we were replacing an old one so we could look at how the old one was installed to get an idea of how this one should be installed. It took us a while to get the old one out but once we did, putting the new one in went fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre E. Mcphillips

customer_reviews.title: Works great, pulls cars over 3500 lbs that roll well
customer_reviews.text: Using it for about a year now. Works great, pulls cars over 3500 lbs that roll well. I have no issues at this point. I had it professionally installed, so can't comment as to that process.
customer_reviews.author: michael h

customer_reviews.title: Gets it done.
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy ,solid winch.I have pulled logs and have gotten my truck unstuck several times since my purchase and have had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beast

customer_reviews.title: Good winch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice winch for the price. I installed in on a Honda 350 rancher 4x4 and it works great. I chained the back of the atv to a tree and used the winch to pull a ford 8N tractor out of the mud so that made a believer out of me. I wish it had synthetic cable but I knew it didn't so I am not going to knock a star off for that. The ability to step away from the vehicle and use the cabled remote is a big plus over my last unit which had only a handle bar switch.
customer_reviews.author: DMS1960

customer_reviews.title: Other then that seems to work good but haven't had more then couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Well made but gave it 4 stars due to a couple of the mounting screws weren't long enough and had to get correct ones at hardware store. That's always a hassle and shouldn't come from the factory that way. Other then that seems to work good but haven't had more then couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rafferty

product_meta.title: Superwinch 1135220 Terra 35 3500lbs/1591kg single line pull with roller fairlead, handlebar mnt toggle, handheld remote
product_meta.description:
Style:Terra 35Superwinch Terra 35 Winch cable version comes with a roller fairlead, mounting plate, handlebar mount toggle, and handheld remote. Steel drum is designed for use with either cable or synthetic rope.

AMAZON.COM


The Superwinch Terra 35 (1135220) provides the high-end power, versatility and durability that serious powersport users demand. A serious workhorse right out of the box, it possesses a superior all-steel 3-stage planetary gear train with machined-in, oil pocket bronze bearings, a 3,500-LB pull rating, a 1.6 horsepower low-amp draw engine, 50-feet of durable 13/64" steel wire rope, a 4-way roller fairlead, multiple operation switching options and more, making it equally suited to recreational and work uses alike.  

High Performance ATV Winching Power
Conceived with the toughest terrains in mind, the Superwinch 1135220 Terra 35 ATV winch delivers on the promise to haul you out of any tight spot you may end up in. Designed to be compatible with most four-bolt pattern ATV winch mount kits available on the market today, the Terra 35 is a fit for virtually any powersport vehicle you ride. Along with a hefty 3,500-LB line pull rating via 50-feet of 13/64" steel wire rope and a 1.6 hp weather-sealed permanent magnet motor powered by an easy to establish permanent connection to your vehicle battery, the Terra 35 features the power and reliability of a heavy-duty all-metal 3-stage planetary gear train. Unlike planetary gears used by competitors, its rugged all steel gears are twice as wide as those used by the competition and utilize machined-in, oil pocket bronze bearings guaranteeing smooth, uncompromised movement for years to come, no matter the weather conditions. Additional features include, a handlebar mounted switch, an ergonomic cam action freespooling clutch allowing users to quickly disengage the motor and manually draw out as much winch rope as needed, at any time, a four-way roller fairlead (mounting plate sold separately), a heavy duty latched hook with thimble and a limited lifetime warranty.  


High performance ATV winching power.
View larger. 
All steel planetary gears with oil pocket bronze bearings vs. competitor's standard gears.
View larger. 
Easy to engage and disengage ergonomic freespool control.
View larger. Important Safety Features
As with all Superwinch products, safety is an important consideration of the Terra winch series. With this in mind the Terra 35 contains a wealth of valuable safety features standard. These include mechanical load holding and dynamic braking to minimize the possibility of wire rope slippage in the event of power failure or surge, and to provide quick stopping of the drum; a sealed solenoid and circuit breaker protection to ensure safe, reliable, electromagnetic power in all weather conditions; and a rubberized remote switch with a 10-foot extension cable, allowing for safe distances and positioning between the user and winch during off vehicle use.  Standard Features: 

 * Powers load in and out
 * 50' of 13/64" steel wire rope
 * Mechanical load holding and dynamic brake
 * All steel planetary gear twice as wide as those used by the competition and utilizing machined-in, oil pocket bronze bearings
 * Ergonomic cam action freespooling clutch
 * High efficiency, low amp draw, sealed 1.6 hp permanent magnet motor
 * Circuit breaker protected
 * Weather sealed solenoid contact
 * 4-way roller fairlead
 * Heavy duty latched hook with thimble
 * Limited lifetime warranty.

What's in the Box
1-Terra 35 3,500-LB winch, 1-standard 4-way roller fairlead, color-coated leads for connection to battery, 1-50' length of 13/64 (15.2m x 5.5mm) steel rope, 1-heavy duty latched hook with thimble, 1-rubber handheld remote with 10' rubber , 1-handlebar switch with 8' cable, 1-4" handsaver strap, mounting hardware, 1-sealed solenoid, 1-circuit breaker component, 1-set of plastic ties, 1-users manual.  

Specifications: Rated line pull 3,500 LB (1,588 kg) bottom layer Motor 1.6 hp Motor, 12V DC Gearing 3-stage planetary Gear ratio 140:1 Braking Mechanical and Dynamic Freespool clutch Cam action Wire rope 13/64" (5.5mm) x 50' (15.2m) Dimensions 13.4" l. x 4.5" d. x 4.8" h.
(340mm l. x 114mm d. x 122mm h.) Drum Diameter 2.0" (50.8mm) Drum Length 3.2" (81.3mm) Weight 20 LB (9.07kg) Switching method Handlebar mounted toggle Switching mechanism Heavy duty, sealed solenoid Roller fairlead Standard, 4-way Color-coated wiring Yes Handheld remote Yes, 10' Wireless remote Optional Mounting Bolt Pattern 3.0" x 4.87" (76mm x 124mm) Performance 12VDC (Bottom layer on drum): Line Pull Motor AMPS Line Speed LB (kg) 12V FPM (m/m) 0 0 19 22.5 (6.9) 500 (227) 45 19.3 (5.9) 1,000 (454) 67 17.3 (5.3) 1,500 (680) 90 15.3 (4.6) 2,000 (907) 114 13.8 (4.2) 2,500 (1,134) 138 12.3 (3.7) 3,000 (1,161) 164 10.8 (3.3) 3,500 (1,588) 195 8.75 (2.67) 
Limited Lifetime Warranty
Superwinch, LLC warrants to the original buyer that the mechanical components of all genuine Superwinch winch models shall be free from defects in materials and workmanship from the date of purchase of new products for the lifetime of the winch and that the electrical components shall be free from defects in materials and workmanship for one year from the provable date of purchase, or otherwise specified time period. Any product that Superwinch determines to be defective will be repaired or replaced at Superwinch's discretion without charge to buyer upon buyer's compliance with disclosed procedures.  About Superwinch, LLC.
Superwinch products are the winches trusted by professionals and weekenders alike for everything from racing to recovery, boating to off-roading. With their sleek, compact construction, Superwinch products are designed for fast, easy installation - whether portable or permanent. Available in capacities ranging from 1,000 to 30,000 pounds, Superwinch has the right winch for your application.
feature_bullets: High efficiency, low amp draw, sealed 1.6 hp permanent magnet motor featuring mechanical load holding and dynamic brake
50' of 13/64" steel wire rope and ergonomic cam action freespooling clutch
All steel planetary gear twice as wide as those used by the competition and utilizing machined-in, oil pocket bronze bearings
Circuit breaker protected and weather sealed solenoid contact.4-way roller fairlead, heavy duty latched hook with thimble and limited lifetime warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
